监控屏幕触摸事件

Posted by maniaU on May 5, 2016
前端
技术

SASS

Encoding.default_external = ‘utf-8’

@charset ‘utf-8’;

$ClientWidth:750px;//UI效果图的宽度一半 @function pxToRem($px){ @return 10$px/$ClientWidth/11rem; }

@mixin font-dpr ($font-size) { font-size: $font-size; [data-dpr=”2”] & { font-size: $font-size * 2; } [data-dpr=”3”] & { font-size: $font-size * 3; } }

css2rem
